name: The Apparition
description:
Little prototype I created in two days for the 'Ghost Jam' hosted by Jimi Masuraki

https://itch.io/jam/ghost-jam

I decided to make my game about phasing through things like a ghost or apparition but the prototype in its current version doesn't utilize that as much as I would have liked.

I intended for there to be more than 1 ability but that will be implemented if I decide to continue development.

Instruction:

Space to phase through objects

WASD to walk around
